name: Dentsply Sirona Inc.
description: Dentsply Sirona Inc. is a leading global manufacturer of dental products and technologies, dedicated to improving oral health and advancing dentistry worldwide. Formed from the merger of Dentsply International and Sirona Dental Systems in 2016, the company provides a broad range of solutions to dental professionals, including dental consumables, equipment, and technology. Dentsply Sirona's product portfolio includes dental implants, orthodontics, restorative materials, digital imaging systems, and CAD/CAM solutions, which are designed to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of dental practices. With a commitment to innovation, Dentsply Sirona invests significantly in research and development to deliver cutting-edge technologies and products that improve patient outcomes. The company's mission is to empower dental professionals to provide the highest quality care to their patients and to improve access to oral health services globally. Dentsply Sirona operates in more than 120 countries and collaborates with dental professionals to foster education, training, and best practices in the field. The company is dedicated to sustainability, focusing on environmentally friendly practices in its operations and product development, contributing to a healthier planet.
ceo: Ernest J. K. W. R. (Rick) W. D. H. Sirona

key_executives.name: Ernest J. K. W. R. (Rick) W. D. H. Sirona

seo.meta_title: Dentsply Sirona Inc. | Innovating Dentistry and Oral Health

faq.question: What does Dentsply Sirona specialize in?
faq.answer: Dentsply Sirona specializes in dental products and technologies, including equipment, consumables, and digital solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Dentsply Sirona?
faq.answer: The CEO of Dentsply Sirona is Ernest J. K. W. R. (Rick) W. D. H. Sirona.

faq.question: Where is Dentsply Sirona headquartered?
faq.answer: Dentsply Sirona is headquartered in York, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: What are Dentsply Sirona's main products?
faq.answer: Dentsply Sirona's main products include dental implants, CAD/CAM systems, restorative materials, and digital imaging systems.
